page.title: 05RELIGION IN WEST KILBRIDE(2)
page.content:
Although there are several {churches and religions in West {Kilbride}everyone exists together without any animosity.Clubs and societies are open to everyone and are well-attended. The vast majority of parents choose to send their children to the local primary school, although a few Roman Catholic parents send their children to the nearest Roman Catholic school which is in Ardrossan, six miles away.
Many children are members of a{Sunday {School}or{Bible Club}and a popular weekly Bible Club is run in West Kilbride Primary School by a local doctor and his wife. Local churches also have close ties with the elderly in the village as well as involving themselves in summer playschemes for youngsters.
